          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Arbete - ordkunskap 1</string>
            <string language="en">Work - vocabulary 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit - Wortschatz 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail - vocabulaire 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho - vocabulário 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro - vocabolario 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία - λεξιλόγιο 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo - vocabulario 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på ord som har med arbetslivet att göra.Modul 6 - Vad vill du? - Ord och uttryck 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train on the words that have to work to do. Module 6 - What do you want? - Words and expressions 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">Safir</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir auf den Wörtern aus, die 
arbeiten müssen, um zu tun. Modul 6 - Was wünschen Sie? 
- Wörter und Ausdrücke 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous nous exerçons sur les mots qui doivent 
travailler pour faire. Module 6 - Que voulez-vous ? 
- mots et expressions 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos nas palavras que têm que 
trabalhar para fazer. Módulo 6 - Que você quer? - 
palavras e expressões 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo sulle parole che devono lavorare 
per fare. Modulo 6 - Che cosa desiderate? - parole 
ed espressioni 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε στις λέξεις που πρέπει να 
λειτουργήσουν για να κάνουν. Ενότητα 6 - τι θέλετε; - 
Λέξεις και εκφράσεις 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos en las palabras que tienen que 
trabajar para hacer. Módulo 6 - ¿Qué usted desea? 
- palabras y expresiones 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
